description: [``botocore``] Updates the *InstanceStorageConfig APIs to support a new ResourceType: SCREEN_RECORDINGS to enable screen recording and specify the storage configurations for publishing the recordings. Also updates DescribeInstance and ListInstances APIs to include InstanceAccessUrl attribute in the API response.
[``botocore``] Add Amazon EC2 instance recommendations export
[``botocore``] Documentation updates for AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM).

[``botocore``] This release adds SDK support for request-payer request header and request-charged response header in the "GetBucketAccelerateConfiguration", "ListMultipartUploads", "ListObjects", "ListObjectsV2" and "ListObjectVersions" S3 APIs.
